name: 帕梅拉·珍·摩根
name_full: 帕梅拉·珍·摩根 Pamela Jayne Morgan
introduction: Pam is an award-winning SAG-AFTRA actress whose career has spanned many components of the entertainment industry: radio voice-over actor, industrial "corporatainment" producer, theatrical dance studio founder, and children's theater director. Later in life, she got back to treading the boards in theatre, and then tossed her hat into the film and television ring.After a few successful years in the Boston market making commercials, industrials, short and indie films, and web series, Pam took a bite of the Big Apple and she continues to enjoy the fruits of her labor there, as well as in New England. In 2021, she served as the Executive Producer, Story Originator, and Lead Actress for her short film, "The Principal's Assembly," which is currently on the festival circuit. In addition to numerous awards for her film, television, and theater projects, Pam was honored as an "Imaginnaire" by Imagine Magazine in 2019 for her contributions to the New England Film Industry.A native of Fall River, Massachusetts, she's a loyal supporter of animal welfare and children's health organizations, an avid reader, dog lover, wine enthusiast, party planner, die-hard Red Sox and Patriots fan, and beach goddess.
